entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 60

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 70

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
